properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 19 at 1:58PM PST until January 21 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts
up to 50 kt and steep seas building to 14 to 17 feet expected.
For the Small Craft Advisory, seas 10 to 11 feet at 14 seconds.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 5 PM Monday to 8 AM PST
Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM PST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The swell will slowly diminish through
tonight.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY
